pages.text: $(item)Bottled Air/$ can be consumed to refill your air bar. Each bottle contains roughly $(thing)three minutes/$ of air.
The $(item)Spacesuit Helmet/$ will automatically keep your air supply topped up by consuming $(item)Bottled Air/$ from your inventory.
The $(item)Pressure Gauge/$ will tell you when the air outside of your helmet is breathable.

pages.title: Leaves
pages.text: Leaves can be used to craft more Bottled Air, so make sure to bring a couple stacks.

pages.title: Wood
pages.text: Wood is useful, and space doesn't have a lot of trees.

pages.title: Food
pages.text: Bring an ample supply of food; unfortunately you can't eat regolith.
